stages.logText: I found Hettar, a tough boy about my age, on top of Blackwater mountain. He kept calling for a certain Norry.
Hettar's little dog Norry has run away. He was very anxious to find him. I promised to get Norry back.
Hettar has given me a piece of Norry's favorite food.
I have offered Hettar's piece of Wyrm meat to Norry, who took it eagerly.
Norry ran off to reunite with Hettar.
Hettar thanked me a thousand times for my help in finding Norry.
I explained to Hettar that I killed Norry. Hettar broke down on the floor in agony.
